distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nginx fixes the following issues:

nginx was updated to 1.16.1 (jsc#ECO-1401)	  

- Added TLS 1.3 support (jsc#SLE-9295, bsc#1150711)
- Replaced obsolete GeoIP module with MaxMinDB-based GeoIP2
  (jsc#SLE-11184, bsc#1156202)
- Started nginx after network is online (bsc#1155690)	  
- CVE-2019-20372: Fixed an HTTP request smuggling with certain error_page 
  configurations which could have allowed unauthorized web page reads (bsc#1160682).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: NGINX before 1.17.7, with certain error_page configurations, allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ability of an attacker to read unauthorized web pages in environments where NGINX is being fronted by a load balancer.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
